events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and all documents appear complete.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department based on the candidate's experience in software development.
An engineering recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to begin the recruitment process and schedule initial screening.
Initial screening call with the candidate was completed successfully; strong technical skills and relevant experience were discussed.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the next steps in the interview process.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th with the engineering panel to assess coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview with excellent performance on coding challenges and system design problems.
HR interview has been arranged for May 10th to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and salary expectations.
HR interview ended positively; the candidate expressed enthusiasm about the company culture and growth opportunities.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits aligned with their expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and is eager to proceed with the hiring process.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team.
Onboarding activities for the new engineer have started, including system access setup and orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the new engineer fully onboarded and integrated into their team.
